data.message: Eminem have u ever thought about writing a book? Or have already that I don't know about? Not for profit, but just to show people and give people a true sense of who you really are? Ya know, let people inside your head, the things you would never put on paper for a song.. I think that would be awesome but that's just me.. Everybody that thinks this is a good idea, give this so many likes that Em actually see's it and gives it some thought!!!
